description: Sikandra was chosen by Emperor Akbar as the location for his mausoleum during his reign in the late 16th century. Construction of the tomb began during Akbar's lifetime and was completed by his son, Jahangir, after his death in 1605.
timings: Open mostly whole day from sunrise to sunset

description: The Agra Fort was built by the Mughal Emperor Akbar in the 16th century and later expanded by his successors, including Shah Jahan, who built the Taj Mahal.
timings: Open mostly whole day from sunrise to sunset
